original: Kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: kilesam dhammam paṭicca nokilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a corrupt phenomenon as condition, an uncorrupt phenomenon arises, a root-cause condition. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava
translated: With root-cause as condition, nine … With an effect as condition, one … With an unobscured phenomenon as condition, nine …
